body:
Have you recently upgraded your system to the macOS Sierra beta ?

On Mon, Aug 8, 2016 at 1:36 PM, s7v7nislands <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!
>
>    1. What version of Go are you using (go version)?
>
> go version go1.6.3 darwin/amd64
>
>
>    1. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (go
>    env)?
>
> GOARCH="amd64"
> GOBIN="/Users/s7v7nislands/source/gocode/bin"
> GOEXE=""
> GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
> GOHOSTOS="darwin"
> GOOS="darwin"
> GOPATH="/Users/s7v7nislands/source/gocode"
> GORACE=""
> GOROOT="/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.6.3/libexec"
> GOTOOLDIR="/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.6.3/libexec/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64"
> GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT="1"
> CC="clang"
> GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -fno-common"
> CXX="clang++"
> CGO_ENABLED="1"
>
>
>    1. What did you do? If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the
>    error. A complete runnable program is good. A link on play.golang.org
>    is best.
>
> go get github.com/sourcegraph/checkup
>
>
>    1. What did you expect to see?
>
> install checkup package
>
>
>    1. What did you see instead?
>
